sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations with non-square matrices
message_1:
Consider the following system of equations: 

2x + 3y + 5z = 14 
3x + 2y + 4z = 12 
4x + 5y + 3z = 17 

Using the Gaussian elimination method, solve for x, y, and z.
message_2:
To solve the given system of equations using Gaussian elimination, we will perform row operations to transform the augmented matrix into its reduced row-echelon form (RREF). The given system of equations can be represented as the following augmented matrix:

| 2  3  5 | 14 |
| 3  2  4 | 12 |
| 4  5  3 | 17 |

Step 1: Swap Row 1 and Row 2 to get the largest pivot in the first column.

| 3  2  4 | 12 |
| 2  3  5 | 14 |
| 4  5  3 | 17 |

Step 2: Eliminate the first element of Row 2 and Row 3. To do this, we will perform the following row operations: R2 = R2 - (2/3)R1 and R3 = R3 - (4/3)R1.

| 3    2    4 | 12  |
| 0    5/3  7/3| 2  |
| 0    7/3  1/3| 1  |

Step 3: Multiply Row 2 by 3/5 to make the pivot in the second column equal to 1.

| 3    2    4 | 12  |
| 0    1    7/5| 6/5 |
| 0    7/3  1/3| 1  |

Step 4: Eliminate the second element of Row 3. To do this, we will perform the following row operation: R3 = R3 - (7/3)R2.

| 3    2    4 | 12  |
| 0    1    7/5| 6/5 |
| 0    0   -8/5| 1/5 |

Step 5: Multiply Row 3 by -5/8 to make the pivot in the third column equal to 1.

| 3    2    4 | 12  |
| 0    1    7/5| 6/5 |
| 0    0    1  | -1/8|

Step 6: Eliminate the third element of Row 1 and Row 2. To do this, we will perform the following row operations: R1 = R1 - 4R3 and R2 = R2 - (7/5)R3.

| 3    2    0 | 12 + 1/2 |
| 0    1    0 | 6/5 + 7/40 |
| 0    0    1 | -1/8      |

Step 7: Eliminate the second element of Row 1. To do this, we will perform the following row operation: R1 = R1 - 2R2.

| 3    0    0 | 25/2 - 12/5 |
| 0    1    0 | 6/5 + 7/40 |
| 0    0    1 | -1/8        |

Step 8: Divide Row 1 by 3 to make the pivot in the first column equal to 1.

| 1    0    0 | (25/2 - 12/5)/3 |
| 0    1    0 | 6/5 + 7/40      |
| 0    0    1 | -1/8            |

Now, we can read the solution from the augmented matrix:

x = (25/2 - 12/5)/3 = 1
y = 6/5 + 7/40 = 2
z = -1/8

So, the solution to the given system of equations is x = 1, y = 2, and z = -1/8.
